reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 319/03: APPORTIONMENTS - HOMES FOR THE AGED AND REST HOMES IN TERRITORIAL DISTRICTS
reg_info.reg_name_text: APPORTIONMENTS — HOMES FOR THE AGED AND REST HOMES IN TERRITORIAL DISTRICTS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 319/03: APPORTIONMENTS - HOMES FOR THE AGED AND REST HOMES IN TERRITORIAL DISTRICTS
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “apportionment” means an apportionment made by a board of management of a home among the contributing municipalities within a territorial district of the total amount required under subsection 24 (4) or 25 (1) of the Homes for the Aged and Rest Homes Act; “contributing municipality” means a municipality that is required to defray the expenditures or costs of a home under subsection 24 (4) or 25 (1) of the Homes for the Aged and Rest Homes Act; “home” means a home established and maintained under section 6 of the Homes for the Aged and Rest Homes Act or a home maintained and operated under an agreement with the Minister of Health under section 10 of the Homes for the Aged and Rest Homes Act.  O. Reg. 319/03, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“apportionment” means an apportionment made by a board of management of a home among the contributing municipalities within a territorial district of the total amount required under subsection 24 (4) or 25 (1) of the Homes for the Aged and Rest Homes Act;

“contributing municipality” means a municipality that is required to defray the expenditures or costs of a home under subsection 24 (4) or 25 (1) of the Homes for the Aged and Rest Homes Act;

“home” means a home established and maintained under section 6 of the Homes for the Aged and Rest Homes Act or a home maintained and operated under an agreement with the Minister of Health under section 10 of the Homes for the Aged and Rest Homes Act.  O. Reg. 319/03, s. 1.

content.content: 2. For the purposes of the apportionment under subsection 321 (2) of the Act, the expenditures or costs of maintaining and operating a home or altering, renovating or adding to or extending an existing home shall be apportioned, on a percentage basis, among the contributing municipalities for that home in accordance with the Table.  O. Reg. 319/03, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. For the purposes of the apportionment under subsection 321 (2) of the Act, the expenditures or costs of maintaining and operating a home or altering, renovating or adding to or extending an existing home shall be apportioned, on a percentage basis, among the contributing municipalities for that home in accordance with the Table.  O. Reg. 319/03, s. 2.

content.content:
